content: Using the algebraic notation system, each square on the board is identified by a letter and a number. The letters – from “a” to “h”, left to right of white's player – correspond to the vertical lines (columns). The numbers – from 1 to 8, also from the position of white – correspond to the horizontal lines (rows). For example, a checker on c5 is in the encounter of the 3rd column with the 5th row.
translations: ita:Utilizzando il sistema di notazione algebrico, ogni quadretto sulla scacchiera è identificato da una lettera e un numero
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
